intro: Trachydium obtusiusculum, commonly known as the bluntleaf sandwort, is a low-growing perennial plant native to arid and semi-arid regions of North America. It belongs to the family Montiaceae and is characterized by its small, succulent leaves that are typically arranged in a rosette formation.
